content:
Certainly! Here are 5 different standalone paragraphs that outline pain points that this customer avatar might be feeling:

1. As a stay-at-home mom, you've put your passion for art on the back burner while you focus on raising your children. But now that they're getting older, you're itching to pick up your paintbrushes again. The only problem is that you have limited experience with digital art and online selling platforms, and you're not sure where to start.
2. You've always dreamed of turning your passion for art into a profitable business, but the thought of navigating the world of online marketplaces and social media marketing is overwhelming. With limited time due to family commitments, you need a step-by-step guide that will help you master the art of digital art creation and selling.
3. You're tired of feeling like you're not living up to your full potential as an artist and entrepreneur. You know that there's a market for digital art, but you're not sure how to break in or stand out. You need guidance and support to help you create and sell your digital art in a way that's authentic and profitable.
4. You're no stranger to self-doubt and fear of failure, and the idea of putting yourself and your art out there for the world to see is scary. You need a supportive and encouraging environment that will help you build confidence and overcome your fears.
5. You're frustrated with the limitations of traditional art forms and are excited by the possibilities that digital art offers. But with so many digital art tools and platforms to choose from, it's hard to know where to begin. You need a comprehensive course that will help you master the technical and creative aspects of digital art, and guide you through the process of building a successful business around it.
